attributes.action: scrap the proposed legislation to ban people from the internet for file sharing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Under proposed legislation Internet Service Providers would become responsible for monitoring and policing their networks to find and disconnect those using Peer to Peer technology to share files.

This is a massive invasion of privacy.

We ask the Prime Minister to scrap this legislation before it even develops and to allow file sharing in the UK provided it is for personal use only.

rejection.details: No such proposals have been put forward.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
